action-managewiki: Button to manage the settings of a wiki.
core-main: Used as a section header in Special:ManageWiki which is a page that allows administrators to manage their wiki's settings
deletedwikis: Used as a heading in Special:DeletedWikis which is a page that lists deleted wikis
logentry-managewiki-delete: A message that is logged when a wiki has been deleted using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-delete-group: A message that is logged when a user group has been deleted using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-lock: A message that is logged when a wiki has been locked using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-namespaces: A message that is logged when a namespace has been modified using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-namespaces-delete: A message that is logged when a namespace has been deleted using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-rename: A message that is logged when a user group has been renamed using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-settings: A message that is logged when a wiki's settings have been modified using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-undelete: A message that is logged when a wiki has been undeleted using ManageWiki
logentry-managewiki-unlock: A message that is logged when a wiki has been unlocked using ManageWiki
managewiki: User right to manage a wiki's settings
managewiki-changes-none: A message that is shown when people try to save changes without actually making any change
managewiki-conflicts: A message that is shown under a setting that conflicts with another
managewiki-disabled: Message that indicates that a feature is not yet enabled on a wiki.
managewiki-error-conflict: A message that is shown when a setting conflicts with another
managewiki-error-disallowednamespace: A message that is shown when someone tries to create a disallowed namespace
managewiki-label-dbname:
Used as a label for 'dbname'.
{{Identical|Database name}}
managewiki-missing: Message if the wiki entered does not exist in the database.
managewiki-requires: Text that indicates a particular setting needs something else to be enabled first
managewiki-review-checkbox-changed: Message to be displayed in review changes dialog for changes to a checkbox field.
managewiki-review-checkbox-enabled:
Displayed in review changes dialog when a checkbox is enabled.
{{Identical|Enabled}}
managewiki-review-checkbox-disabled:
Displayed in review changes dialog when a checkbox is disabled.
{{Identical|Disabled}}
managewiki-review-close:
Text for the ManageWiki 'Close' button in the review changes dialog.
{{Identical|Close}}
managewiki-review-input-changed: Message to be displayed in review changes dialog for changes to an input field.
managewiki-review-no-changes: No changes made message for the review changes dialog.
managewiki-review-none: Message to replace in place of a form value in the review changes dialog when form field is empty.
managewiki-review-title: Title for the ManageWiki review changes dialog.
managewiki-sidebar-header:
Used as a label for the sidebar.
{{Identical|Administration}}
managewiki-success: Message when the wiki request was succesfully sent.
managewiki-warning-changes: Warning shown (except in Firefox) when attempting to leave ManageWiki with unsaved changes.
